verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Leprosy, All my skin is falling off of me And it's simple, very plain to see I've got a case of Leprosy

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Leprosy, Friends and family shy away from me And I can't afford a colony Oh I am stuck with Leprosy

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Why I have to rot, I know not I cannot say Gangrene is better but I am stuck, with Leprosy

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Leprosy, All my clothes are dirty rags you see That's why all the people stare at me Oh why do I have Leprosy

verse.name: c2
verse.lines: Why I have to rot, I know not I cannot say Gangrene is better but I am stuck with Leprosy

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Leprosy, I'm not half the man I used to be That's 'cause half of me is dead you see Oh I am plagued with Leprosy What do you call a leper in a sauna......Stew
